living_room.label: Living Room
living_room.description: You are standing in a small living room.

door.label: Bedroom Door
door.description: There is a door to the north and a door to the south. The north door seems to be locked.

unlock.fail: You need a key to unlock the door.
unlock.success: The key fits and unlocks the door.

force.success: The door won't budge. You really need that key.

kitchen.label: Kitchen
kitchen.description: The kitchen is dirty, there are dishes everywhere and it smells like rotten eggs. You see footsteps leading to and from a drawer.

jar.label: Glass Jar
jar.description: A brittle glass jar. It has something inside.

break.label: Broken Glass Jar
break.description: A bunch of broken pieces of glass. Watch out, you might get hurt.

mop.label: Mop
mop.description: A mop that can be used for cleaning.

drawer.label: Drawer
drawer.description: A kitchen drawer is still ajar.
drawer.inspect: There is something shiny in drawer.

key1.label: Key
key1.description: An old rusty key that looks like it could fit the internal doors.
key1.inspect: The key seems to contain another, smaller, key.

minikey.label: Minikey
minikey.description: A miniature key hidden inside the bigger key.

key2.label: Key
key2.description: A new key that fits in you bum.

bedroom.label: Bedroom
bedroom.description: A messy bedroom that has been recently slept in, judging by the smell.
